projects.title: OZXK Blog | Full Stack React Project
projects.description: This is my blog site with a content management system that allows me to create/edit my posts and manage my website easily. It is built with React, Next.js and SASS. It also has strong backend support with Node.js and MongoDB. I have also developed a custom CMS for this project.

projects.title: Freelance Wordpress Projects
projects.description: In the last 4 years, I have developed 6-Live Wordpress websites for clients from several industries. I have developed websites for local businesses, e-commerce websites, and learning management systems. With these I have gained experience in SEO, caching policies, minifying and lazy but most important UI/UX.
